### âœ… Review Checklist

Before requesting a review, please ensure you have completed the following:

-   [ ] **Code Quality:** My code adheres to the project's coding standards and linting rules (e.g., using ESLint/Prettier for JS/TS).
-   [ ] **Documentation:** I have updated the documentation (e.g., `README.md`, inline comments) where necessary to reflect my changes.
-   [ ] **Tests:** New and existing unit/integration tests pass locally. If new features were added, I have added corresponding tests.
-   [ ] **Dependencies:** I have checked for and updated any necessary dependencies.
-   [ ] **Security:** I have considered potential security implications and addressed them.
-   [ ] **Cross-browser Compatibility:** (If applicable for browser extensions) I have tested my changes in supported browsers.
-   [ ] **Self-Review:** I have thoroughly reviewed my own code changes.
